thread.title: Khloe, Lamar put divorce on hold to give marriage another chance
thread.title_full: Khloe, Lamar put divorce on hold to give marriage another chance - Sports

author: ANI
title: Khloe, Lamar put divorce on hold to give marriage another chance
text:
Washington: Khloe Kardashian and her estranged husband Lamar Odom have recently called off their pending divorce, giving their marriage a second try.
The duo together went to the court to dismiss their divorce case, TMZ.com reports.
Also Read:  Has Khloe Kardashian put boyfriend on hold for Lamar Odom? 

Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom. Pic/ AFP 
The 31-year-old TV personality's attorney Laura Wasser has asked the judge to withdraw the divorce papers, signed by both of them.
The judge accepted Wasser's request and has dismissed their divorce case.
Khloe had filed for divorce earlier in December 2013, however, it is said that she was dragging her feet for more than a year to save her marriage.
